name: Handlebars Template
summary: Learn about .HANDLEBARS files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: A Handlebars expression is the basic unit of the template and appears like this: {{contents}}.
To deliver a HANDLEBARS file to the browser, include it in the script tag:
NOTE: Handlebars is a JavaScript library that helps developers create templates that bind data, which creates cleaner, more efficient code.

description: File created by Handlebars, a web template framework; contains a template written in HTML code and embedded with handlebars expressions; same as the .HBS file.
